rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: He's a great professor and is very knowledgeable in the PR area. I would definitely take a class with him again. Clear expectations and a fair grader. He's also passionate and wants to keep in touch with students after the class is over which is very refreshing.
Professor Saffer was very nice. He obviously has a lot of experience in PR and gave interesting lectures. I would take a class with him again.
He is a great professor who really enjoys getting to know his students. Read the book and keep up with the lectures and you should be fine. He teaches it split and I miss his half of the semester.
